description:
encoding/binary: improve package comment.

The current package comment doesn't mention varints and
protocol buffers. Also, the first sentence is incomprehensible
without further context as "fixed-size values" is undefined.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I do not want to mention protocol buffers.
Yes, the varint happens to be used in protocol
buffers, but it gets used in plenty of other things,
and the Go standard library is not explicitly trying
to conform to protocol buffers in any way.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8d4fd582202b ***

encoding/binary: improve package comment.

The current package comment doesn't mention varints and
protocol buffers. Also, the first sentence is incomprehensible
without further context as "fixed-size values" is undefined.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5715048

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5715048: encoding/binary: improve package comment.
